titles.title: Helping Americans Return to Work Act of 2020
Helping Americans Return to Work Act of 2020
A bill to cap the benefits received under the Federal Pandemic Unemployment Compensation program at prior wages.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: Helping Americans Return to Work Act of 2020 This bill limits payments under pandemic unemployment programs established by the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act or the CARES Act to an individual's average weekly wages on which the benefit is based.
